sentences.en: an evening class in car maintenance
sentences.cn: 夜校的汽车维修课程

sentences.en: Engineers are carrying out essential maintenance work on the main line to Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 机修工正在对通往剑桥的干线进行必要的养护。

sentences.en: He has to pay maintenance to his ex - wife .
sentences.cn: 他必须给 前妻 赡养费.

sentences.en: He has to pay maintenance to his ex - wife because she is looking after the child.
sentences.cn: 他得付给 前妻 赡养费,因为她抚养孩子.

sentences.en: He learnt tractor maintenance.
sentences.cn: 他学会了拖拉机维修.

sentences.en: His firm took over the planting and general maintenance of the park last March.
sentences.cn: 他的公司去年3月接管了公园的绿化和日常维护工作。

sentences.en: His small farm provides maintenance, but not much more.
sentences.cn: 他的小农场能使他们维持生活, 但仅此而已.

sentences.en: In the future the machines will need spare parts and maintenance.
sentences.cn: 这些机器将来会需要备件和维修保养。

sentences.en: Money will be directed primarily towards the maintenance and rehabilitation of schools, clinics and machinery.
sentences.cn: 资金将主要用于学校、诊所和机器设备的维护和修缮。

sentences.en: Other than blowing up a tyre I hadn't done any car maintenance.
sentences.cn: 除了给轮胎充气外，我没做过任何汽车保养。

sentences.en: She was a high-maintenance girl who needed lots of attention.
sentences.cn: 她是个很缠人的女孩，需要很多的关注。

sentences.en: Small gardens can be high maintenance.
sentences.cn: 小花园可能需要耗费很多精神打理。

sentences.en: the cost of repairs and maintenance
sentences.cn: 维修保养费

sentences.en: The maintenance programme will additionally seek to keep the sites free of graffiti.
sentences.cn: 这个维护方案还会试图保护这些地点不被涂鸦。

sentences.en: The purpose of the UN is the maintenance of international peace and security.
sentences.cn: 联合国的宗旨是维护世界和平与安全。

sentences.en: The school pays for heating and the maintenance of the buildings.
sentences.cn: 学校负担这些大楼的供热和维修费用。

sentences.en: The theatres were closed on Saturday and Sunday for routine maintenance .
sentences.cn: 戏院周六和周日关闭进行例行维护。

sentences.en: There are certain things that are absolutely basic to the maintenance of a good relationship.
sentences.cn: 要保持良好的关系,有些条件是必不可少的.

sentences.en: There is a backlog of repairs and maintenance in schools.
sentences.cn: 对各学校的修缮和维护工作积压了一堆。

sentences.en: They have to find the fathers who abandon their children and make them pay maintenance.
sentences.cn: 他们必须找到那些抛弃子女的父亲，让他们支付抚养费。

words.tran_cn: 可维持的；可主张的；可维修的
维持；继续；维修；主张；供养

phrases.tran_cn: 少量维护保养；维修费用低；工作量不大的技术维护
维护服务；技术维修，技术维护

trans.tran_cn: 维持，保持，保养，保管，维护，维修
trans.tran_en: the repairs, painting etc that are necessary to keep something in good condition
